A!pkk[T}FP0k90D8qT}C.text: This brodcasts every time the Player platforming script is run. It does all the animation of your character, while the hitbox does all the sensing.

8OCG^j?Y%U4Yr)!O#9FG.text: This is for the walk cycle loop. Depending on how long your walk cycle is, you can adjust the numbers in the "If ___ then" area.

;9[DamZAq6hb4Jjzh_]_.text: This block is used to remember what costume you are on, since the character loops back to the hitbox everytime the platforming script runs. Then, when the Engine_Tick brodcast comes again, it sets the costume to whatever it was last.

Y33@[okb5%-s%2%xXg^..text: Feel free to adjust the size of your character; it won't ruin the engine if you do :)

tdcV{2D%HDE2XNukVh6R.text: The script for moving left (and the script under it is for moving right). You can change how fast or slow you go by editing the "Change PlayerX By" scripts (just make sure it is negative for the left movement).

y*:kR,7j{yYU/:jH-=6W.text: This is the script for wall jumping. If you don't want wall jumping in your game, just remove this script.

y1:pWmg(:T_h2rPW=MQ3.text: This is the script for jumping. To make the Player jump higher or lower, just change the number in the "Set PlayerY To" block.

xq8`*`QTJgIQT42jCb-g.text:
REPLACE ALL_SPRITE!

If you don't know what I mean by this, refer to the backdrop.

{orFi6F2Y2O7w(Yn/Pkh.text: This is the script that detects when you fall, and makes you start a little farther back than where you were. If you don't like this feature, either remove this script or change the code of what happens when you fall. (Also, the "Key R Pressed" command is for restarting in case you get stuck)

F/gx+Sls%}a1rJZlsb15.text:
REPLACE ALL_SPRITE!

If you don't know what I mean by this, refer to the backdrop.

y1:pWmg(:T_h2rPW=MQ3.text: This is the script for jumping. To make the Player jump higher or lower, just change the number in the "Set PlayerY To" block.

y*:kR,7j{yYU/:jH-=6W.text: This is the script for wall jumping. If you don't want wall jumping in your game, just remove this script.

[aZE/Ea#He-V^t|QV,G7.text: This is for the hitbox. The hitbox is what hits all the objects in this game. Having a hitbox usually gives smoother gameplay and less "getting stuck". Be sure to make the hitbox the size of your character.

tdcV{2D%HDE2XNukVh6R.text: The script for moving left (and the script under it is for moving right). You can change how fast or slow you go by editing the "Change PlayerX By" scripts (just make sure it is negative for the left movement).

;9[DamZAq6hb4Jjzh_]_.text: This block is used to remember what costume you are on, since the character loops back to the hitbox everytime the platforming script runs. Then, when the Engine_Tick brodcast comes again, it sets the costume to whatever it was last.
